name: BackRooms Level 2
description:
Based on the Backroom universe, this game is about a visitor that no-clips into the backrooms at night after having followed some mysterious GPS coordinates found on the darknet. The post said it was some kind of portal but did not precised what could be crawling on the other side. The only thing that remains is the visitor's footage to the level 2 of the backrooms. Are you ready to discover it?

Controls

WASD: backward, forward, left, right

Run: Shift

Requirements 

CPU: i5 or greater

GPU: GTX 1050 (might work with lower end hardware but untested).
